io.hekate.spring.boot.coordination

Class HekateCoordinationServiceConfigurer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.hekate.spring.boot.coordination.HekateCoordinationServiceConfigurer

  • @Configuration
 @ConditionalOnHekateEnabled
 @ConditionalOnBean(value=io.hekate.coordinate.CoordinationProcessConfig.class)
 @ConditionalOnMissingBean(value=io.hekate.coordinate.CoordinationServiceFactory.class)
public class HekateCoordinationServiceConfigurer
extends Object
    « start hereAuto-configuration for CoordinationService.

    Overview

    This auto-configuration constructs a Bean of CoordinationServiceFactory type and automatically registers all Beans of CoordinationProcessConfig type.

    Note: this auto-configuration is available only if application doesn't provide its own Bean of CoordinationServiceFactory type and if there is at least one Bean of CoordinationProcessConfig type within the application context.

    Configuration properties

    It is possible to configure CoordinationServiceFactory via application properties prefixed with 'hekate.coordination'. For example:

    • 'hekate.coordination.nio-threads'
    • 'hekate.coordination.retry-interval'
    See Also:
    CoordinationService, HekateConfigurer
